member.name: M:Penguin.Cms.Core.Extensions.IServiceProviderExtensions.GetRepositoryForType(System.IServiceProvider,System.Type)
member.summary: Returns the most derived repository for the provided type
member.param: The type to get the repository for
member.returns: An instance of that repository from the service provider
